title: Vast says it will launch its first space station in 2025 on a Falcon 9
summary: "We have a clear path for how we're going to get there."

title: On National Security | The space surveillance arms race is in full swing
summary: For some time now, alarms have been sounding in the United States military over activities of Chinese and Russian spacecraft in orbit that are viewed as potentially threatening. U.S. military […]

title: BREAKING! VAST Announces Haven-1 Station & VAST-1 Mission
summary: VAST announces plans to launch the world's first commercial space station, named Haven-1, into low-Earth orbit no earlier than August 2025.

title: Rocket Lab sees itself as leader of the small launch industry
summary: As other companies suffer technical or financial setbacks, Rocket Lab says it believes it is the leader in the small launch market with little competition.

title: Virgin Galactic looks ahead to future spaceplanes as it gears up for return to space
summary: As Virgin Galactic prepares to finally begin commercial flights, the company is providing new details about how its next generation of vehicles can put the company on a path to profitability.

title: China launches resupply mission, lands space plane, and readies methane rocket
summary: China plans to continue its ongoing supply chain for the Tiangong Space Station (TSS) by launching the Tianzhou-6 mission. The launch occurred at 13:25 UTC on May 10 and lofted a Tianzhou capsule on top of a Chang Zheng 7 (Long March 7).

title: Rocket Lab revenue increases slightly, company adds NASA launch contract
summary: Rocket Lab’s revenue increased slightly in the first quarter, but losses grew as well, as the spacecraft and launch company added a NASA contract and continued to invest in its future Neutron vehicle.

title: Florida-based intercity rail service adopts Starlink
summary: Brightline said it has become the first passenger rail company to offer Starlink satellite broadband, which it plans to deploy on a total 10 trains connecting cities across parts of Florida this summer.

title: Virgin Galactic quarterly loss widens while company preps for spaceflight return this month
summary: Virgin Galactic is aiming to fly its first spaceflight in nearly two years later this month, but the company’s first quarter loss widened dramatically as it funds its fleet growth.

title: Construction starts on Orbex Scottish launch site
summary: Small launch vehicle developer Orbex says that it has started construction on its launch site in northern Scotland, but remains guarded about when it plans to start launching from there.
